attributes.action: 18 chicken broiler units planning ovrer turned unanimously by local wychavon council
attributes.additional_details: chicken broiler farms on greenfield arable land near water meadows and ssi nature reserves.application turned down unanimously by wychavon council over ruled instantly by inspectorate near upton snodsbury worster.over 70 letters of objection no consultation with local villages,no benefit of any sort to the area. land bought at twice the price by farmers from wales  review how this is allowed to happen and why our local councils wishes have so easily been ignored
